comments: Stack enough sub-stats to reach 67% Effect Hit Rating and 134 Speed after which stack ATK% as much as possible. While fishing for ATK% ensure your HP and Defence is not neglected and aim for the recommended stat template to ensure Guinaifen isn't constantly getting 1-shot. Break effect can also be good but is more suited to highly specialized Guinaifen builds.
substats: ATK% = EHR (67%) = SPD > Break Effect = HP% = DEF%
traces_priority: High Poles (A2) > Walking on Knives (A6) > Bladed Hoop (A4)
name: DoT Focus
